abstract_summ: As of March 23, 2020, suspension of non-essential activities was declared in Mexico in order to mitigate the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic . Average age was 43 years, and 58 % were males; 44 % of initial cases were imported . Lethality in the population during the first month went from 1.08 to 3.97 per 100 cases; trend is linear and similar to that observed in Europe .
